text: École pour l'informatique et les nouvelles technologies, commonly named EPITECH, is a French private college establishment in Le Kremlin-Bicêtre (close to Paris), Bordeaux, Rennes, Marseille, Lille, Lyon, Montpellier, Nancy, Nantes, Nice, Strasbourg, Saint-André, Réunion, Moulins, Allier and Toulouse, France.EPITECH : l’Ecole de l'Expertise Informatique EPITECH is specialized in the different fields of IT. The school is part of IONIS Education Group. ==References== Category:Schools in France Category:1999 establishments in France Category:Réunion
title: Epitech
